LanguageData.BuildPDW.label: 제작 : 우지 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildPDW.description: The 우지 is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power and high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.\n구경 : 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildHeavySMG.label: 제작 : 스펙터 M4 루거 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildHeavySMG.description: Builds a compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.\n구경 : .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildTMPMachinePistol.label: 제작 : 사일런스 TMP (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildTMPMachinePistol.description: Builds a 사일런스 TMP (tactical machine pistol). Somewhat accurate at long range, has fast burstfire but low stopping power.\n구경 : 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildSkorpionSMG.label: 제작 : 스콜피온 EVO 3 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildSkorpionSMG.description: Builds a 스콜피온 EVO 3, a machine권총 or light 기관단총 with a notorious folding stock design. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at 권총 range.\n구경 : 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildM3SMG.label: 제작 : M3 기관단총 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildM3SMG.description: Builds a M3 기관단총, a very simplistic submachinegun design. Low damage, high fire rate and short range.\n구경 : .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildVector.label: 제작 : 크라이스 백터 K10 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildVector.description: Builds a 크라이스 백터 K10, a submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximum range by a lot.\n구경 : .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildMP5Gun.label: 제작 : HK MP5A3 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildMP5Gun.description: Builds a Heckler Koch Machine 권총 5A3, a 9mm submachine gun of German design. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.\n구경 : 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildUMP45Gun.label: 제작 : HK UMP45 (기관단총)
LanguageData.BuildUMP45Gun.description: The HK UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.\n구경 : .45 ACP
